page.title: 17AN ORDNANCE SURVEYOR
page.content: My dads name is Peter Dickens.He is 36 years old. He works in Darlington at Vincent House. He works for the government Ordnance Survey department. He gets up at 7.00 and goes to work at 7.45 usually he comes in at 4.30 pm.He has one hour for his packed lunch which he will eat in the office.There are 12 people working in the office 11 men and a woman. Some days he goes out with some other surveyors because he is a senior surveyor. He goes out into the fields with a theodolite.A theodolite is a tripod with a sort of telescope on top which the surveyor looks through to measure how high above sea level the ground is and he keeps a record of these heights and puts them on his maps.At the moment he is working on the new Darlington eastern by-pass. By Clare Dickens(10)
